tool.name: OGS: convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray'.
tool.command: convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray --new-property-data-type '$new_property_data_type' --new-property-name '$new_property_name' #if str($existing_property_name): --existing-property-name '$existing_property_name' #end if #for $f in $in_mesh: --in-mesh '$f' #end for --out-mesh output_1.vtk

param.name: new_property_data_type
param.label: new property data type
param.help: the name of the data type as string

param.name: new_property_name
param.label: new property name
param.help: the name of the new cell data array (PropertyVector) the values are

param.name: existing_property_name
param.label: existing property name
param.help: the name of the existing cell data array (PropertyVector)

tool.help: This tool runs the **convertVtkDataArrayToVtkDataArray** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
